description.en: Main concepts related to new religious movements will be explained. An introduction to the new religious movements active in Estonia will be offered as well as an analysis of relevant problems and topics, such as causes for their emergence and spread as well as their relationship with the wider society and media.
description.et: Kursuses tutvustatakse uususunditega seotud mõisteid, Eestis tegutsevaid uususundeid janendega seotud probleeme ja teemasid nagu tekke ja leviku põhjused, uususundite kajastamine meedias ning nende suhted ühiskonnaga.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to introduce research on new religious movements, to explain the most commonly used concepts and talk about themes and problems related to the new religious movements.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on anda ülevaade uususundite uurimise ajaloost, teadusdistsipliinis käibel olevatest olulisematest mõistetest ning uususunditega seotud teemadest ja probleemidest.

learning_outcomes.en: After the completion of the course the student:
- is familiar with different new religious movements as well as with topics and problems related to them,
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb erinevaid uususundeid ning nendega seotud probleeme ja teemasid,

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to use the relevant academic vocabulary,
- has gained initial experience and competence in fieldwork.
learning_outcomes.et: - omandab esmase välitöötegemise kogemuse ja oskuse.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
